titleStmt.title: Three elegies the first to the memory of Lieutenant-General Mackay, the second to the memory of my Lord Angus, only son of the Marquis of Dowglas, the third to the memory of Lieut. Collonel Fullerton : who were all three slain at the attacque at Steekerken near Enguin ... / written by Ro. Fleming.
titleStmt.author: Fleming, Robert, 1660?-1716.
